infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Nido Horneros requires access to your camera to let you add pictures to your reports.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Nido Horneros needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload images to your reports. Your images will not be shared without your permission.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Nido Horneros needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload images to your reports. Your images will not be shared without your permission.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Nido Horneros requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you where your report is.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Nido Horneros requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you where your report is.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Nido Horneros requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you where your report is.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Nido Horneros requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you where your report is.
